title: PUCSL wants Social Media ban lifted immediately
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka has requested the Telecommunications Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka and all Mobile Service Providers to activate/restore all social media platforms immediately.
The PUCSL said it is unable to inform the consumers of electricity, which is an essential service, about impending power cuts.
‘Blanket closure of social media is NOT permissible’ – SL Human Rights Chief
ICTA Chairman resigns hours after social media ban in Sri Lanka
